description: Number of ways of getting 5 of a kind, a royal flush, other straight flush, 4 of a kind, full house, other flush, other straight, 3 of a kind, 2 pair, a pair or no pair in 5-card poker when joker is wild.
references: J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 585.
R. L. Frey, "According to Hoyle", Fawcett, 1956, p. 32.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
